attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Councils have closed roads to vehicles thus mythacly creating congestion, our town has over 100 roads closed off thus vehicles are forced onto a few major roads tail backs are now the norm.
Congestion is a council made problem, we do not need extra new roads when the country has had thousands of roads closed, these roads were rights of way, open them up congestion gone.
